divs: Sighting DetailsAfter giving case to the sighting at my friends I couldnt see it driving, but I could see the glow lighting up the tops of the trees. I was stopped at the top on Seeley rd. That scared me so I drove home. I got home about 10- 10:30pm I was on the phone with my mother who was the only one I knew who would pick up when a light came down the same one I was following, and flew right over head. I felt like it knew I was there, and I was scared I wasnt sure if I should go inside or get in the truck and drive away. Instead I stayed on the phone, and watched it. It was soo close and bright when it was right over head, but it kept going so I calmed down. Going south due north first. I hung up, and went inside to look for my tripod. I set it up in the yard and at 11:00pm or so it came back this time East to West. I took a photo first then switched it to video and shot almost 2 minutes of video. This might be weird, but I sorta asked it to come back... like kinda prayer, or meditation I'm not sure, but I know somehow I am connected to this.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Cadillac
There was one other sighting in Cadillac on or around August 9th 2013
Summary: UFO flies over head flares up then comes back got it on video.
